articles.author: Aditya Chaturvedi
articles.title: Pooja Vastrakar, Sneh Rana put India in the driver's seat - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The hosts bowled Australia out for 219 and then made their way to 98/1 at close on Day 1. | Cricket
articles.content: Pooja Vastrakar continued her fine form with the ball, before Shafali Verma and Smriti Mandhana added a 90-run partnership for the first wicket, as India gained the upper hand against Australia on Da… [+4711 chars]
